body_html:
Note that .tolist() is only called once in the beginning of the script (to create the random split).
I don't think that runtime-wise it matters.

I don't see any issue in merging this as is. It doesn't break backwards-compatibility, and fixes an issue with pandas (that we don't have control over).

body:
Note that `.tolist()` is only called once in the beginning of the script (to create the random split).
I don't think that runtime-wise it matters.

I don't see any issue in merging this as is. It doesn't break backwards-compatibility, and fixes an issue with pandas (that we don't have control over).
